__TOC__

This document provides instructions on how to import ''Microsoft Office'' document templates into ''OpenOffice''.

# Open any of the OpenOffice applications
# Click '''File''' -> '''New''' -> '''Templates and Documents'''
# Click '''Organize''' and select ''My Templates''
# Click '''Commands''' -> '''Import Template''' and browse to the location of the template
# Select ''All files (*.*)'' from the '''Files of Type''' option list
# Select the template and click '''Open'''. This will import the template into your ''My Templates'' directory

'''Note:''' Some complicated templates may not display correctly in OpenOffice due to small incompatibilities between OpenOffice and Microsoft Office. However, most templates should be usable.

----
